1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

A clear description of what you expected to happen.

## Actual Behavior
What actually happened instead.

If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

- OS: [e.g. Windows 10, macOS 12.0]

- [ ] Critical (Application unusable)
